D

debug - package debug
 
debug(String) - Static method in class GameEnvironment
Print debug messages on the standard output if debug mode is activated.
debug(String) - Static method in class Player
Write message to the standard output if debugging is enabled
DebugAction - Class in debug
This class is a sample internal action also useful for debugging.
DebugAction() - Constructor for class debug.DebugAction
The default constructor initializes the GUI.
debugFrame - Variable in class debug.DebugAction
The GUI Frame of the debugger.
DebugFrame - Class in debug
The GUI class of the DebugAction displaying the agent's current belief base.
DebugFrame() - Constructor for class debug.DebugFrame
The default constructor creates the frame with all visual objects.
debugging - Static variable in class GameEnvironment
Indicates if the simulator should display debug messages
debugging - Static variable in class Player
Is the player in debug mode?
decreaseFoods() - Method in class GameModel
Decrease food values in every round as a factor of their state
direction - Variable in class Agent
The actual orientation of the agent.
display(GLAutoDrawable) - Method in class GameView
Called by the drawable to perform rendering by the client.
display(boolean) - Method in class SummaryGraphs
Display the summary graphs
displayChanged(GLDrawable, boolean, boolean) - Method in class GameView
Called by the drawable when the display mode or the display device associated with the GLDrawable has changed
displayed - Variable in class SummaryGraphs
Are the graphs already displayed?
dispose(GLAutoDrawable) - Method in class GameView
Dispose the display context
disqualified - Variable in class Team
Is the team already disqualified?
disqualify() - Method in class Team
Disqualify team
done - Variable in class GameEnvironment
Indicates if the simulation ended
drawnFactor - Variable in class EnergyBars
Percent of difference between teams meaning drawn
drawThread - Variable in class GameView
The thread responsible for drawing - it has to sleep to slow down animation
